channel.title: How to Get Birth Certificate and Death Certificate on Government Services Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in How to Get Birth Certificate and Death Certificate on Government Services Documentation

item.title: How to Get Birth Certificate and Death Certificate
item.description:
How to Get Birth Certificate and Death Certificate

From Birth to Death!
Government Documents / Services - Guidebook

Birth Certificate

Birth Certificate is very important for everyone. This certificate is very essential for:

  • Joining school
  • Applying for passport
  • Proving age for marriage
  • Getting voting rights
  • Driving license
  • Medical insurance
  • And many other purposes

The central government has been emphasizing the mandatory registration of births and deaths to formulate national plans related to public health and medicine.
